resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103553</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103553</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205877</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">You Be the Conservator</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sie sind das Konservator</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vous soyez le conservateur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Você seja o conservator</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Siete il conservatore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Είστε conservator</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Usted sea el conservador</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">invites students to play the role of a museum conservator, discovering clues about an historical object in order to preserve or restore it. In the featured activity, the object is a santo, a painted woodcarving of a saint in the Catholic Church.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">lädt Kursteilnehmer ein, die Rolle eines Museum 
Ausdehnungsgefäßes zu spielen und entdeckt Anhaltspunkte über eine 
historische Nachricht, um sie zu konservieren oder wiederherzustellen.
In der gekennzeichneten Aktivität ist die Nachricht ein santo, 
ein gemaltes Woodcarving von einem Heiligen in der katholischen 
Kirche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">invite des étudiants à jouer le rôle d'un 
conservateur de musée, découvrant des indices au sujet d'un objet 
historique afin de le préserver ou restaurer. Dans l'activité 
décrite, l'objet est un santo, woodcarving peint d'un saint dans 
l'église catholique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">convida estudantes jogar o papel de um conservator
do museu, descobrindo indícios sobre um objeto histórico a fim 
preservá-lo ou restaurar. Na atividade caracterizada, o objeto 
é um santo, woodcarving pintado de um saint na igreja catholic.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">invita gli allievi a svolgere il ruolo di un 
conservatore del museo, scoprente gli indizii circa un oggetto storico
per conservarlo o ristabilire. Nell'attività descritta, 
l'oggetto è un santo, woodcarving verniciato di un san nella chiesa 
cattolica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προσκαλεί τους σπουδαστές για να διαδραματίσει το ρόλο
conservator μουσείων, ανακαλύπτοντας τις ενδείξεις για ένα 
ιστορικό αντικείμενο προκειμένου να τον συντηρήσει ή να 
αποκαταστήσει. Στη χαρακτηρισμένη δραστηριότητα, το 
αντικείμενο είναι ένα santo, χρωματισμένο ενός Αγίου στην 
καθολική εκκλησία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">invita a estudiantes que desempeñen el papel de 
un conservador del museo, descubriendo pistas sobre un objeto 
histórico para preservarlo o restablecer. En la actividad 
ofrecida, el objeto es un santo, el woodcarving pintado de un santo en
la iglesia católica.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205877</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103553</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/you-be-the-conservator</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
